Plot: An orphaned Kurdish child (Hejar) and a Turkish pensioner (Rıfat) are thrown together by circumstance. Rıfat, a widowed retired judge, refuses to get involved in politics. He is forced out of his solitude, when Hejar the only survivor of a police raid on his Kurdish neighbors, takes refuge at his home. Gradually, he warms up to the kid and decides to reunite her with her family.
starring: Şükran Güngör|Dilan Erçetin|Füsun Demirel|Yıldız Kenter|İsmail Hakkı Şen|Sevinc Erol|
